text_block_list.text: The appointed day. With permission from the school, I had brought Smart Falcon to the Ooi Racetrack.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I see～ ……but, why today of all days? There aren't any big races, and there aren't many spectators.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……you're probably trying to show me the good parts of dirt racing, right? In that case, I would think seeing bigger races would be better.
choice_data_list: You'll understand once you see it

text_block_list.text: ――The races that day were incredibly fierce. Even while covered in dirt, the participating Uma Musume competed with all they had.
Pushing their strength to the limits, painfully gasping for breath. It wasn't something you could say was beautiful. Even then, no, perhaps because of that―

text_block_list.name: Crowd
text_block_list.text: Goooooo!! Don't lose-!! Go, go, gooooo-!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……! Ah, look out! Ah! Ah, ah, aaaah～! Waaaaaaa～……!!
Perhaps captivated by them doing their utmost, everyone who was watching raised their voices, and then―

text_block_list.name: Center Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Haaa, haaa…… Everyone～! Thank you for the passionate cheers today～!!

text_block_list.name: Center Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Haaa…… Huuu～, alright, let's keep smiling until the end! And so, please listen. Our song is……―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ――Haaaa～…… that was amazing! It was a really great Live, wasn't it～!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Everyone was sparkling as they gave their best to the point they were about to collapse. No matter how much dirt they were covered in, it was still beautiful―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah…… That's right, that's how it is. It's because they run with all their might, that an Umadol shines brightly.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It's because they had to fight and win to sing on stage that it moves people. I was moved too. Those were the Umadols that I looked up to!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Being able to to move someone's heart, it doesn't matter whether it's Turf or Dirt. Even then…… I didn't think much about dirt.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: It couldn't be helped that even if you won on Dirt, you wouldn't be able to move people…… I had already convinced myself of that…… Haaa～, I'm disappointed in myself.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: For now…… anyways, I'm glad I got to see the stage today! It helped me realize something important, and I had a lot of fun.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But everyone, just like me, won't easily be drawn to that stage. Because Dirt doesn't get much attention, people don't know about such passionate Lives.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Because there's no Top, this whole time few people have realized it. It just feels like such a waste～.
choice_data_list: Then you just need to become the Top

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hee……? What do you mean by that……?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……! That's right……!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: You're right! With my running, singing, and dancing! I just need to make Dirt the place where the Top is!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: A world where everyone will aim for, and give attention to Dirt! Falco will be the one to change it……!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……huh? Could it be that that's something really difficult? Harder than becoming a Top Umadol?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ahaha～…… but, it being difficult isn't a reason to give up, right? In that case, I'll need to put in even more work than before!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: If nobody knows who Falco is, then I can't draw in anyone. So I need to start by making a name for myself!
choice_data_list: Keep working hard and a chance will come
Keep working hard and a chance will come

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehhhhh～ If I keep working as hard as before, nothing will change! I need to be able to seal the deal☆ and figure out how to do that!
I nod to Smart Falcon. Even now she continues to move forward. And because of that―

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Eh……
The first day I met her. Illuminated by the evening sky, singing and dancing alone, she was―― sparkling brilliantly.
Nobody was watching her, nobody was listening to her. But still performing with that smile――
――She was able to give someone courage and hope.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I've made up my mind! You see, Trainer-san, about the next Selection Race――
――Several months later. It was the first Selection Race to occur after teaming up with Smart Falcon.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Alright then, Falco will be heading out☆ I'll be waiting for those passionate cheers☆

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That girl……who is she? She was really enthusiastic…… I'm pretty sure she's a new face on Dirt though.
The buzz was short-lived, and talk quickly turned back to another, more prominent, Uma Musume. But that's exactly why today…… she would stand out more than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huuu…… Yaaaaaaaa☆☆☆☆

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Wha-……!? So fast!!
She powerfully kicked up the sand and flew ahead faster than anyone else, and the entire audience stared in amazement.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ahaa, it's so easy to run……! Yeah, that's right! I already knew that! This is my……!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: This is the "Stage" that I can shine on! Alright, Falco's On Staaaaaaage☆☆
―Just like a falcon flying freely in the sky. The Dirt was her sky, and nobody could catch her.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: I did iiiiit～!! I won, Falco wooooon～～☆☆

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Wai-wait a minute! You, where have you been all this time!? If you don't have a trainer yet, even if it's for a little, could we talk……!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: No way, Falco's super popular☆ But, that talk will have to wait juuuuuust a little bit!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ah, there they are! Trainer-saaaan!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Thanks☆ Hey hey, was Falco sparkling?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Ehehee, that's great! And on that note, there's something important I want to talk about. I want to ask properly…… will you hear me out!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! Will you become Falco's trainer and aim for Top Umadol together with me!?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ……! Ehehee☆ Thank you, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: And so, with that all wrapped up! All of you fans～! Once again from the top, it's Intro Time☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: If Falco runs away～? (You should chase!) Catch her with lots of love☆ It's the strongest Umadol, Smart Falcon☆

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Falco's dream is to "use" the Dirt to become the Top Umadol! To make that come true, I need everyone's cheering! That's why――

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: The incredibly lovely Falco, make sure to chase her a loooooot, okay☆? Ehe♪
